channel.title: Items Teleport
channel.description: Does anyone could help me by telling me how to make a 'item teleport you' like if you click on that item it will tele you to the cord u added cause i want to add 'teletab' and could someone link me to a tutorial about adding teletab it would be really apreciated thanks you

item.title: Items Teleport
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Clickingmost.
Add the item ID as a case,
trigger the teleport,
Add emote/gfx (optional)
Add a sendMessage or sM function (optional)
Break the case.[/quote]
ClickingMost is for buttons, not items. You would have to add the itemid to boolean wear

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { if (wearID == ITEMID) { triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, height); return false; }

Read full topic

trigger the teleport,

Add a sendMessage or sM function (optional)
Break the case.[/quote]do you know where i can get tabtele gfx? and emote oh and i need to know how to make them (all in one) like arrows, money, runes cause they are taking 1 space in inv each tab
